query: SELECT id, name, subject, SUBSTRING(htmlContent, 1, 500) as content_preview FROM lead_email_templates WHERE htmlContent LIKE '%fitprime.com.br%' OR htmlContent LIKE '%/pricing%' LIMIT 10;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3TwTEpp3aQwpk4j.26ab54900c35 --database SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM --execute SELECT id, name, subject, SUBSTRING(htmlContent, 1, 500) as content_preview FROM lead_email_templates WHERE htmlContent LIKE '%fitprime.com.br%' OR htmlContent LIKE '%/pricing%' LIMIT 10;
